#summary Getting the code from subversion

= Structure of the Subversion Repository =

This project is divided into three parts: 
  * an *optimization* library, that is used to optimize the various objectives we use
  * a *pr-toolkit* library that contains shared code 
  * a set of *applications* that use the pr-toolkit and optimization library for a variety of applications
